name: Little people fight with hammers - prototype
name_original: Little people fight with hammers - prototype
description:
Little people fight with hammers, as the name suggests.
you can fight with a friend, or two friends, or with yourself (don't play with yourself, its sad...)

Note: this game is a prototype, it is not good or fun.

Controls: 
Red player: 

A : Right

D :  Left

C  : Jump

V :  Swing

Blue player:

LeftArrow :  Left

RightArrow : Right

Num-0  : Jump

Num-Del :  Swing

Yellow Player:

H : Left

K :  Right 

">" : Jump

"/" :  Swing

Credits:
Gal Lahat - coding
Asaf Gazit - art and stuff
Amitai - music
